00128             function                delete_setting( $SettingName )
00129             {
00130                   try
00131                   {
00132                         if( isset( $this->SettingsList[ $SettingName ] ) === false )
00133                         {
00134                               return;
00135                         }
00136                         
00137                         $NewSettingsList = array();
00138                         foreach( $this->SettingsList as $Key => $Value )
00139                         {
00140                               if( $Key !== $SettingName )
00141                               {
00142                                     $NewSettingsList[ $Key ] = $Value;
00143                               }
00144                         }
00145                         $this->SettingsList = $NewSettingsList;
00146                   }
00147                   catch( Exception $e )
00148                   {
00149                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00150                   }
00151             }

00175             function                transform_settings( $Settings , $Separator )
00176             {
00177                   try
00178                   {
00179                         if( strpos( $Settings , "\r" ) !== false )
00180                         {
00181                               $Settings = str_replace( "\r" , $Separator , $Settings );
00182                         }
00183                         
00184                         if( strpos( $Settings , "\n" ) !== false )
00185                         {
00186                               $Settings = str_replace( "\n" , $Separator , $Settings );
00187                         }
00188                         
00189                         if( strpos( $Settings , $Separator.$Separator ) !== false )
00190                         {
00191                               $Settings = str_replace( $Separator.$Separator , $Separator , $Settings );
00192                         }
00193                         
00194                         return( explode( $Separator , $Settings ) );
00195                   }
00196                   catch( Exception $e )
00197                   {
00198                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00199                   }
00200             }
00201             
00220             function                process_settings( $Settings )
00221             {
00222                   try
00223                   {
00224                         foreach( $Settings as $s )
00225                         {
00226                               $Tmp = explode( '=' , $s );
00227                               if( isset( $Tmp[ 1 ] ) === true )
00228                               {
00229                                     $this->SettingsList[ $Tmp[ 0 ] ] = $Tmp[ 1 ];
00230                               }
00231                               elseif( isset( $Tmp[ 0 ] ) === true && isset( $Tmp[ 1 ] ) === false )
00232                               {
00233                                     $this->SettingsList[ $Tmp[ 0 ] ] = true;
00234                               }
00235                               elseif( isset( $Tmp[ 0 ] ) === false )
00236                               {
00237                                     $Settings = serialize( $Settings );
00238                                     $s = serialize( $s );
00239                                     $Tmp = serialize( $Tmp );
00240                                     throw_exception( "Settings : $Settings s : $s Tmp : $Tmp Illegal settings string" );
00241                               }
00242                         }
00243                   }
00244                   catch( Exception $e )
00245                   {
00246                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00247                   }
00248             }

00276             function                append_settings( $Settings , $Separator = ';' )
00277             {
00278                   try
00279                   {
00280                         if( $Settings === false || $Settings === '' || $Settings === null )
00281                         {
00282                               return;
00283                         }
00284                         
00285                         if( is_array( $Settings ) )
00286                         {
00287                               /* nop */
00288                         }
00289                         else
00290                         {
00291                               $Settings = $this->transform_settings( $Settings , $Separator );
00292                         }
00293                         
00294                         $this->process_settings( $Settings );
00295                   }
00296                   catch( Exception $e )
00297                   {
00298                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00299                   }
00300             }

00466             function                get_all_settings()
00467             {
00468                   try
00469                   {
00470                         $Str = array();
00471 
00472                         foreach( $this->SettingsList as $Key => $Value )
00473                         {
00474                               $Str [] = "$Key=$Value";
00475                         }
00476                         
00477                         $Str = implode( ';' , $Str );
00478                         
00479                         return( $Str );
00480                   }
00481                   catch( Exception $e )
00482                   {
00483                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00484                   }
00485             }

00509             function                load_file( $FilePath , $Separator = ';' )
00510             {
00511                   try
00512                   {
00513                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS === false )
00514                         {
00515                               $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00516                         }
00517                         $RawData =  $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $FilePath );
00518                         
00519                         $this->load_settings( $RawData , $Separator );
00520                   }
00521                   catch( Exception $e )
00522                   {
00523                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00524                   }
00525             }

00686             function                set_package_setting( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $FileName , $SettingName , $Value )
00687             {
00688                   try
00689                   {
00690                         if( $this->CachedMultyFS === false )
00691                         {
00692                               $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00693                         }
00694                         
00695                         $ClassName = get_class( $this );
00696                         
00697                         $S = new $ClassName;
00698                         $S->load_package_settings( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , $FileName );
00699                         $S->set_setting( $SettingName , $Value );
00700                         
00701                         $PackagePath = _get_package_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion );
00702                         $this->CachedMultyFS->file_put_contents( "$PackagePath/conf/$FileName" , $S->get_all_settings() );
00703                   }
00704                   catch( Exception $e )
00705                   {
00706                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00707                   }
00708             }

00767             {

00811             function                get_setting( $SettingName , $DefaultValue = '_throw_exception' )
00812             {
00813                   try
00814                   {
00815                         if( $this->SettingsList !== false )
00816                         {
00817                               if( isset( $this->SettingsList[ $SettingName ] ) )
00818                               {
00819                                     return( $this->SettingsList[ $SettingName ] );
00820                               }
00821                         }
00822                         if( $DefaultValue === '_throw_exception' )
00823                         {
00824                               throw( new Exception( 'Setting "'.$SettingName.'" was not found' ) );
00825                         }
00826                         else
00827                         {
00828                               return( $DefaultValue );
00829                         }
00830                   }
00831                   catch( Exception $e )
00832                   {
00833                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00834                   }
00835             }

00863             function                get_default_values( $SettingsNames , $DefaultValues )
00864             {
00865                   try
00866                   {
00867                         $DefaultValues = explode( ',' , $DefaultValues );
00868                         
00869                         $c1 = count( $DefaultValues );
00870                         $c2 = count( $SettingsNames );
00871                         
00872                         if( $c1 < $c2 )
00873                         {
00874                               for( $i = 0 ; $i < $c2 - $c1 ; $i++ )
00875                               {
00876                                     $DefaultValues [] = '_throw_exception';
00877                               }
00878                         }
00879                         
00880                         return( $DefaultValues );
00881                   }
00882                   catch( Exception $e )
00883                   {
00884                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00885                   }
00886             }
00887             
00914             function                get_settings( $SettingsNames , $DefaultValues = '_throw_exception' )
00915             {
00916                   try
00917                   {
00918                         $Values = array();
00919                         $SettingsNames = explode( ',' , $SettingsNames );
00920                         
00921                         $DefaultValues = $this->get_default_values( $SettingsNames , $DefaultValues );
00922                         
00923                         foreach( $SettingsNames as $i => $SettingName )
00924                         {
00925                               $Values [] = $this->get_setting( $SettingName , $DefaultValues[ $i ] );
00926                         }
00927                         
00928                         return( $Values );
00929                   }
00930                   catch( Exception $e )
00931                   {
00932                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00933                   }
00934             }

01039             function                set_undefined_from_object( $SettingName , $Object , $DefaultValue = '_ignore_unset' )
01040             {
01041                   try
01042                   {
01043                         if( $this->SettingsList !== false )
01044                         {
01045                               if( isset( $this->SettingsList[ $SettingName ] ) === false )
01046                               {
01047                                     if( $Object->get_setting( $SettingName , false ) !== false )
01048                                     {
01049                                           $this->SettingsList[ $SettingName ] = $Object->get_setting( $SettingName );
01050                                     }
01051                                     elseif( $DefaultValue == '_ignore_unset' )
01052                                     {
01053                                           return;
01054                                     }
01055                                     else
01056                                     {
01057                                           $this->SettingsList[ $SettingName ] = $DefaultValue;
01058                                     }
01059                               }
01060                         }
01061                   }
01062                   catch( Exception $e )
01063                   {
01064                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01065                   }
01066             }

01094             function                set_from_object_if_defined( $SettingName , $Object , $DefaultValue = '_ignore_unset' )
01095             {
01096                   try
01097                   {
01098                         if( $this->SettingsList === false )
01099                         {
01100                               $this->SettingsList = array();
01101                         }
01102                         
01103                         if( $Object->get_setting( $SettingName , false ) !== false )
01104                         {
01105                               $this->SettingsList[ $SettingName ] = $Object->get_setting( $SettingName );
01106                         }
01107                         elseif( $DefaultValue == '_ignore_unset' )
01108                         {
01109                               return;
01110                         }
01111                         else
01112                         {
01113                               $this->SettingsList[ $SettingName ] = $DefaultValue;
01114                         }
01115                   }
